channel.title: Revision-X: The most unique server here
channel.description:
[QUOTE]Please disregard the downtime on August 13th, we are back online![/QUOTE]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/logo.png[/img] ★ [img]https://www.google.com/help/hc/images/right_arrow_sm.gif[/img][url=http://www.revisionx.org/play.html]Webclient[/url] ★ [img]http://healthprofessions.kumc.edu/dean/blog/icon_arrow.gif[/img][url=http://www.revisionx.org/download]Download[/url] ★ [img]http://www.decisionstreams.com/App_Themes/Default/images/home-icon.gif[/img][url=http://www.revisionx.org/]Homepage [/url]★ [img]http://www.sept11marriottsurvivors.org/news/2006_08_13%20Movie%20Stirs%209-11%20Memories/Movie%20stirs%209-11%20memories_files/icon_mini_forum.png[/img][url=http://www.revisionx.org/forums/]Forums[/url] ★ [u]Overview[/u] Revision-X is not your ordinary server, we offer completely unique gameplay with never before seen maps, items, and interfaces. We take input directly from our players to ensure the best gaming experience possible. Our dedicated community is ready to help you out and help you succeed. Weekly content updates keep new features coming so you never get bored.
Our server has one of the best combat systems to this date. All weapons have perfect hit formulas, delays, and bonuses. Don't let other servers fool you when they claim to have "perfect combat".
All skills are trainable, and most have areas dedicated specifically to them for a smooth training experience.
The best part of our server is the community, they will make you feel at home and help you succeed.
[u]Server Features[/u] • Completely unique home not on any other server. (Guaranteed) • Nearly all skills work and have a dedicated zone for each of them. • Over 15 bosses, some of which require a team and strategy. • Nearly all minigames including Pest Control, Barb Assault, Fight Caves, and Clan Wars. • ::train area for easy combat training, and ::shops for easy shop access. • Safe clan wars easy accessible through home, the fun never ends here! • Active staff sponsored events including Hide and seek, Drop parties, and more! • Undiscovered hidden easter eggs that give awesome rewards, can you find them? • Everyone has access to the global yell chat, using / to talk!
[u]Client Features[/u] • All the newest items, including squeal of fortune and loyalty items! • New hitsplats with working hiticons on monsters and players. • New interfaces from runescape for all the main tabs. • Optional custom gameframe unique to Revision-X. • One of the most customized clients to the date.
[u]Pictures[/u] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/home.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Bosses.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Minigames.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/ok.png[/img]
[u]Animated gifs[/u] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Bork.gif[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Bridding.gif[/img]
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/Banner.gif[/img]

item.title: Revision-X: The most unique server here
item.dc:creator: @777slots2 777slots2
item.description:
@777slots2 wrote:

I noticed that you claimed “The most unique server here.” and was expecting complete BS. But i was terribly wrong! There is so much I’ve never seen used and I’m very impressed. Not in all the years I’ve played runescape private servers have i seen a server as impressive when it comes to being unique! In all honesty it’s not my type of server ( i like oldschool servers) but I find myself playing regardless. Keep up the good work!

Read full topic

item.title: Revision-X: The most unique server here
item.dc:creator: @Inverse398 Inverse398
item.description:
@Inverse398 wrote:

Please disregard the downtime on August 13th, we are back online!


★ Webclient ★ Download ★ Homepage ★ Forums ★
Overview
Revision-X is not your ordinary server, we offer completely unique gameplay with never before seen maps, items, and interfaces. We take input directly from our players to ensure the best gaming experience possible. Our dedicated community is ready to help you out and help you succeed. Weekly content updates keep new features coming so you never get bored.

Our server has one of the best combat systems to this date. All weapons have perfect hit formulas, delays, and bonuses. Don’t let other servers fool you when they claim to have “perfect combat”.

All skills are trainable, and most have areas dedicated specifically to them for a smooth training experience.

The best part of our server is the community, they will make you feel at home and help you succeed.

Server Features
• Completely unique home not on any other server. (Guaranteed)
• Nearly all skills work and have a dedicated zone for each of them.
• Over 15 bosses, some of which require a team and strategy.
• Nearly all minigames including Pest Control, Barb Assault, Fight Caves, and Clan Wars.
• ::train area for easy combat training, and ::shops for easy shop access.
• Safe clan wars easy accessible through home, the fun never ends here!
• Active staff sponsored events including Hide and seek, Drop parties, and more!
• Undiscovered hidden easter eggs that give awesome rewards, can you find them?
• Everyone has access to the global yell chat, using / to talk!

Client Features
• All the newest items, including squeal of fortune and loyalty items!
• New hitsplats with working hiticons on monsters and players.
• New interfaces from runescape for all the main tabs.
• Optional custom gameframe unique to Revision-X.
• One of the most customized clients to the date.

Pictures



Animated gifs

Read full topic
